name: Space Thingy
description:
Source

https://github.com/IllyaRyhan/SpaceThingy

Controls

WASD - move ship around

Shift - Boost

Mouse - aim

Mouse 1 (hold) - fire

Made By

Illya Ryhan

Ryan

Change Log

1.1

Fixed random function not generating random numbers

As a result spawn rates actually randomized and crates give random weapons

1.2

Fixed Crash on crate pickup

Fixed spawn distances changing with screen size

Fixed same weapon or start weapon on crate pickup

Fixed Enemy infinite orbit around player

Fixed background layers
